S

Server - Class in controller
Server for the ConnectFour game.
Server(String[]) - Constructor for class controller.Server
Initializes a server.
serverDisconnected() - Method in class view.ClientView
Prints that the server has disconnected and that the Client has to start the program again.
serverShutDown() - Method in class controller.ClientHandler
Handles the shutdown of the server.
ServerView - Class in view
View for a Server.
ServerView(Server) - Constructor for class view.ServerView
Creates a new ServerView.
setField(int, Mark) - Method in class model.Board
Sets the content of field i to the mark m.
setField(int, int, Mark) - Method in class model.Board
Sets the content of the field represented by the (row,col) pair to the mark m.
showBoard(Board) - Method in class view.ClientView
Shows the current board.
showBoard(Board) - Static method in class view.LocalView
Prints the game situation.
showClients(String) - Method in class view.ServerView
Shows the lobby of the server.
showGameStart(Board, String, int) - Method in class view.ClientView
Prints the start of a game.
showHint(int) - Method in class view.ClientView
Shows a hint for a move.
showLobby() - Method in class controller.Server
Shows the lobby in the ServerView.
StandardInput - Class in view
Support class for other classes.
StandardInput() - Constructor for class view.StandardInput
 
Strategy - Interface in model
Interface for a Strategy of a Computer Player.
